action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow on the table, the book on the table and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a plate, a cupboard and a counter. The plate is on the counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> open cupboard  

(Note: Continue with subsequent actions based on the game's responses to achieve the goal.)<|im_end|>
Turn 1
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.

> take pillow from cupboard  

(Note: Since the cupboard is empty, you'll need to adjust your action based on the game's environment. Try exploring other areas or interacting with objects to find the pillow.)<|im_end|>
Turn 2
You can't see a pillow here.

> go to pantry  

(Note: Explore the pantry to find the pillow, book, and any other items that might help you achieve your goal.)<|im_end|>
Turn 3
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> open freezer  

(Note: Continue exploring the pantry to find the pillow and book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 4
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.

> open refrigerator  

(Note: Check inside the refrigerator for the pillow and book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 5
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a sandwich, a peach, a apple, a banana and a orange.

> take all from refrigerator  

(Note: After taking all items from the refrigerator, check if the pillow and book were among them. If not, consider other actions or areas to explore.)<|im_end|>
Turn 6
I don't know what 'all' means.

> take sandwich from refrigerator  
> take peach from refrigerator  
> take apple from refrigerator  
> take banana from refrigerator  
> take orange from refrigerator  

(Note: After taking these items, check if the pillow and book are still in the refrigerator or elsewhere in the pantry.)<|im_end|>
Turn 7
You take the sandwich. In your inventory you have a sandwich.

> take peach from refrigerator  

(Note: Continue taking each item individually from the refrigerator.)<|im_end|>
Turn 8
You take the peach. In your inventory you have a sandwich and a peach.

> take apple from refrigerator  

(Note: Continue taking each item individually from the refrigerator.)<|im_end|>
Turn 9
You take the apple. In your inventory you have a sandwich, a peach and a apple.

> take banana from refrigerator  

(Note: Continue taking each item individually from the refrigerator.)<|im_end|>
Turn 10
You take the banana. In your inventory you have a sandwich, a peach, a apple and a banana.

> take orange from refrigerator  

(Note: After taking all the items, check if the pillow and book are still in the refrigerator or elsewhere in the pantry.)<|im_end|>
Turn 11
You take the orange. In your inventory you have a sandwich, a peach, a apple, a banana and a orange.

> search refrigerator  

(Note: Search the refrigerator to see if the pillow and book are hidden or overlooked.)<|im_end|>
Turn 12
The refrigerator is openable and currently open. The refrigerator is empty.

> close refrigerator  

(Note: Since the refrigerator is empty, consider exploring other areas or checking the kitchen again for the pillow and book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 13
The refrigerator is now closed.

> go to kitchen  

(Note: Return to the kitchen to explore other areas or interact with objects to find the pillow and book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 14
You are in a kitchen now. There are a plate, a cupboard and a counter. The plate is on the counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> search cupboard  

(Note: Search the cupboard to ensure the pillow and book are not hidden or overlooked.)<|im_end|>
Turn 15
The cupboard is openable and currently open. The cupboard is empty.

> search counter  

(Note: Search the counter to see if the pillow and book are there or if there are any clues about their location.)<|im_end|>
Turn 16
There is a plate on the counter.

> take plate from counter  

(Note: After taking the plate, check if the pillow and book are now visible or if there are any new clues.)<|im_end|>
Turn 17
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a sandwich, a peach, a apple, a banana, a plate and a orange.

> search counter  

(Note: Continue searching the counter to ensure nothing is overlooked.)<|im_end|>
Turn 18
There is nothing on the counter.

> go to hallway  

(Note: Explore the hallway to find the pillow and book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 19
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a living room and a kitchen here.

> search potted plant  

(Note: Search the potted plant to see if the pillow and book are hidden there.)<|im_end|>
Turn 20
The pottedplant is on the hallway1floor. The pottedplant is takeable.

> take potted plant  

(Note: After taking the potted plant, check if the pillow and book are now visible or if there are any new clues.)<|im_end|>
Turn 21
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a sandwich, a peach, a apple, a banana, a plate, a orange and a potted plant.

> search hallway  

(Note: Search the hallway to ensure nothing is overlooked.)<|im_end|>
Turn 22
Hallway is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> search living room  

(Note: Explore the living room to find the pillow and book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 23
Livingroom is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> go to living room  

(Note: Enter the living room to search for the pillow and book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 24
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair, a book and a shelf. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

> take book from side table  

(Note: After taking the book, check if the pillow is visible or if there are any new clues.)<|im_end|>
Turn 25
You take the book. In your inventory you have a sandwich, a peach, a apple, a banana, a plate, a orange, a book and a potted plant.

> search couch  

(Note: Search the couch to see if the pillow is hidden there.)<|im_end|>
Turn 26
There is nothing on the couch.

> search chair  

(Note: Search the chair to see if the pillow is hidden there.)<|im_end|>
Turn 27
There is nothing on the chair.

> search shelf  

(Note: Search the shelf to see if the pillow is hidden there.)<|im_end|>
Turn 28
There is nothing on the shelf.

> go to bedroom  

(Note: Explore the bedroom to find the pillow.)<|im_end|>
Turn 29
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a pillow, a bed and a table. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the bed. There is a passage to a living room here.

> take pillow from bed  

(Note: After taking the pillow, you can proceed to place all items on the table in the bedroom.)<|im_end|>
Turn 30
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a sandwich, a peach, a apple, a pillow, a banana, a plate, a orange, a book and a potted plant.

> put pillow on table  
> put book on table  
> put plate on table  

(Note: After placing these items on the table, you have achieved your goal.)<|im_end|>
Turn 31
You put the pillow on the table.

> put book on table  

(Note: Continue placing the remaining items on the table.)<|im_end|>
Turn 32
You put the book on the table.

> put plate on table  

(Note: After placing the plate, you have achieved your goal.)<|im_end|>
Turn 33
You put the plate on the table.

> done  

(Note: You have successfully placed the pillow, book, and plate on the table, achieving your goal.)<|im_end|>
Model produced DONE action at turn 34, end episode.
